laptops.Title: Apple MacBook Pro 13' Silver (MR9U2) 2018
laptops.Description: Performance. Even more in your power.\nThe MacBook Pro sets completely new standards for notebook power and portability. High-performance processors, larger memory, advanced graphics, ultra-fast drives and other impressive MacBook Pro capabilities will help you realize any creative projects - even faster than before.

laptops.Title: Apple MacBook Pro 13 Retina 256Gb Silver 2019 (MUHR2)
laptops.Description: Apple`s new MacBook Pro 13 Retina 256Gb Silver 2019 laptop sets completely new standards for notebook power and portability. High-performance processors, larger memory, advanced graphics, ultra-fast drives and other impressive MacBook Pro capabilities will help you realize any creative projects - even faster than before.

laptops.Title: Apple MacBook Air 13' 1.5Tb Gold (Z0VJ000H6)
laptops.Description: Updated MacBook opens up new horizons\nDiscover the updated Apple MacBook Air 2018, which has become even lighter, thinner, more productive and more comfortable than the previous version. The MacBook Air is enclosed in the same rugged and durable case as all Apple models. The only and main difference is the alloy for the housing based on recycled aluminum, which allows us to declare the environmental friendliness of the product. Take full advantage of the updated gadget: a brighter and better display, an improved keyboard, a new generation Force Touch trackpad, and longer battery life.\nUncompromising Image Quality

laptops.Title: Apple MacBook Pro 13' Retina Z0V80004M
laptops.Description: Apple MacBook Pro 13' 2018 - долгожданное обновление популярных ноутбуков. В этом поколении они уже оснащены процессорами Intel Core i5 либо Intel Core i7 восьмой генерации. Производительность которых значительно опережает предыдущие чипы. Интегрированный видеоускоритель Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655 отнюдь не слаб и по мощности соперничает с мобильными дискретными видеокартами начального и среднего сегмента. Базовая конфигурация имеет объем пользовательской памяти равный 256 ГБ, но есть еще версии с 512 ГБ, 1 ТБ и даже 2 ТБ. Объем оперативной памяти стандарта LPDDR3 равен 8 ГБ, но можно выбрать конфигурацию с 16 ГБ.

laptops.Title: Apple MacBook Pro 15' Space Gray (MR9479/Z0V1002M3)
laptops.Description: Touch ID Improved security. One touch is enough.\nUnlock your Mac instantly. Use Apple Pay to securely pay for online purchases. Quickly access system settings, open password-protected notes, switch between accounts - all this can be done with one touch.

laptops.Title: Apple MacBook Air 13` (MQD32)
laptops.Description: MacBook Air - Full Day\n\nThe MacBook Air runs on a single charge for up to 12 hours - meaning you are free of wires and sockets all day. When you want to relax, you can watch movies in iTunes for up to 12 hours in a row. In addition, the MacBook Air can standby for up to 30 days. You can take a break for several weeks and return to work where you left off.

laptops.Title: Apple MacBook Air 13' Retina 256GB (MRE92) Space Gray
laptops.Description: Almost weightless. At a new height\nThis is my favorite Mac to fall in love with again. The new MacBook Air is even thinner and lighter, equipped with a Retina display, Touch ID, a new generation keyboard, Force Touch trackpad. And presented in three colors - silver, gold and 'gray space'. This is the most environmentally friendly Mac. Preserving its iconic design, Apple used only recycled aluminum for the case. And this is an incredibly convenient MacBook Air - it works all day without recharging and can cope with any tasks.

laptops.Title: Apple MacBook Pro 15' Space Gray (MR9321) 2018
laptops.Description: Performance. Even more in your power.\nThe MacBook Pro sets completely new standards for notebook power and portability. High-performance processors, larger memory, advanced graphics, ultra-fast drives and other impressive MacBook Pro capabilities will help you realize any creative projects - even faster than before.

iphone.Title: Apple iPhone Xs Max 512GB Space Gray (MT622)
iphone.Description:
Apple iPhone Xs
The hero of the big screen.
Super Retina Display. Even faster Face ID. The most powerful and smartest iPhone processor. And an awesome dual camera. The iPhone Xs embodies everything you love about the iPhone. On a new level.
Super Retina. Super sizes.
The amazing display of the iPhone Xs occupies the entire front panel, so you have even more space for your favorite activities.
